summary: Provides a fsspec‑compatible virtual file system that translates standard file‑system calls into operations on a DVC (Data Version Control) repository, automatically detecting repositories, handling nested sub‑repositories, and fetching tracked data as needed.
business_intent: Enable applications and data pipelines to interact with versioned DVC data through familiar file‑system APIs, simplifying data access, reproducibility, and integration of DVC‑managed datasets.
